actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.

official_title: A bill to amend the Agricultural Act of 1949 to change the formula used to determine the price support level for tobacco.

summary.text: Provides that only the yield for the prior calendar year (presently prior three calendar years) shall be taken into account to determine the price support level for tobacco under the Agricultural Act of 1949.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Agricultural Act of 1949 to change the formula used to determine the price support level for tobacco.
